Reviews.Title: Liked it so much - Purchased same for replacement
Reviews.Author: John '88
Reviews.Content: I'm overseas and my wife's Blue Sanyo Xacti that I had purchased for her several years (~4) ago stopped working.  She assumed it was a bad battery and purchased a new battery from Amazon but it did not solve the problem.  So I found a $40 used Sanyo Xacti in a burnt orange.  She loves it because she doesn't have to learn all the features to a new camera and now has three batteries (org with blue camera 4 yrs old, replacement battery, and the one that came with the used orange camera).  It is a handy little camera that fits in pants pocket or purse and is used for a lot of quick family photos on the go.  This camera really introduced my wife to digital photography and now she literally uses it everyday.

ProductInfo.Name: Sanyo Xacti Vpc-t850 Blue ~ 8 Mp Digital Camera w/ 3x Optical Zoom & Face Detection
